content: in a civil case that lasted for 2 years and 9 months the tartu county court ruled that the defendant is responsible for paying the procedural costs which amount to €634932 the court also made a judgment in favor of the defendant and dismissed the claim made by the claimant for late payment the court ordered the defendant to compensate the claimant with an amount of €4414323 for the division of joint assets the court considered expert opinions and evidence presented by both parties to determine the division of assets and the compensation to be paid the court also set a deadline for the claimant to provide evidence of joint liability in loan agreements the court concluded the case with a final decision and stated that an appeal can be filed within 30 days the text also mentions the background of the case including marriage and property ownership as well as loans and improvements made to the property the court considered the time spent by the claimant in preparing procedural documents and made adjustments to the compensation for the claimants representative the court also reduced the time spent on certain activities during the proceedings the text provides a summary of the progress of the case without specific details about the parties involved or the nature of the case
